properties.title: Splash & Spa Tamaro
properties.abstract: Situated 10 km from Lugano, Splash & Spa Tamaro is the first water park open 365 days a year to offer water leisure activities, a spa and wellness treatments in a single complex, with more than 10,000 square metres dedicated to entertainment and well-being.
properties.description:
The complex comprises Splash (7,000 square metres) and Spa (3,000 square metres), spread among three separate communicating domes. 

The Entertainment dome features a large pool with one-metre-high waves, a hydromassage tub with a poolside bar and a children’s area with a selection of games, where parents can relax. The Action dome houses five latest-generation slides offering an unforgettable descent. 

The Wellness & Spa dome contains a spacious and luxurious spa, where visitors can indulge in themed saunas and Turkish baths, massages and a range of other treatments to recharge their batteries and recover, in just a few hours, from the stress of everyday life.

In addition, the complex offers several outdoor attractions including a superb panoramic swimming pool heated to 34°C. Finally, there is a large terrace with an enchanting view of the surrounding mountains, a sauna and a salt-water pool heated to 34°C. 

Splash & Spa Tamaro offers all-round fun, entertainment, well-being and health and is open 365 days a year.
